msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Remove ADOBE SYSTEMS license, if present, and insert Apache license - modules.  Will need another pass to convert files not handled by the scripts.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
* Package and class level javadoc for the swfutils module.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Integrating latest fxgutils fixes from Sujata and Min for the following issues:
- MXMLC compiler doesn't recognize scientific notation for values in path data
- radial gradient for strokes doesn't get modified by a matrix transformation)
- output from fxgutils for stroke/radial_gradient_stroke/radial_gradient_stroke_path_focal_point.fxg does not match output from mxmlc
- output from fxgutils for stroke/radial_gradient_stroke/ radial_gradient_stroke_path_spread.fxg does not match output from mxmlc
- All color transform files don't match output from mxmlc.
- Allow FXGUtils to process FXG 2.0 files and log a warning instead of throwing an exception.
Also exposing the unicode parser logic in FontManager to assist in font utility creation.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Adding a work around for the difference in attribute names from FXG to MXML. The FXG tracking attribute is mapped to trackingRight. The four FXG margin attributes: marginLeft, marginRight, marginTop, marginBottom are mapped to paragraphStartIndent, paragraphSpaceBefore, paragraphEndIndent, paragraphSpaceAft. This change does not yet take into account direction.
Also a quick fix to allow embedded font unicode chars greater than FFFF.
QE: Yes, just a quick confirmation of the bugs fixes.
SDK-21555 - When compiling an FXG 1.0 document, 'tracking' should be mapped to 'trackingRight'
SDK-21096 - Incorrect compilation error on [Embed] of a font
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Take two at a partial fix for SDK-21182 - this fix includes a correction to FontManager's parsing of the compatibility version string given that it is only concerned with the major version number for now.
QE: Yes, please look out for any mustella failures for text comparisons on halo components. The previous issues that we saw should now be resolved.
Mustella tests: AdvancedCSS now all pass, cyclone also showed all DataGrid tests now Pass
SDK-21182 - Fix logic surrounding compatibility version and SWC default.css selection during PreLink
